name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: World of Warcraft: Gul'dan Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash Gul'dan's dark magic with ominous visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the dark magic of Gul'dan from World of Warcraft with this epic live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A shadowy and intense interface inspired by the power and corruption of Gul'dan’s fel magic.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that reflects the dark allure and devastating power of Gul'dan.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Immerse yourself in WoW-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as dark and powerful as Gul'dan’s influence.
